T02D2418:36a-1: b'a yu bo dhi tsitta sra ba na bha ba na au p'a yam n'a ma /
T02D2418:36a-3: byang chub sems kyi rlung rgyu ba'i gdams ngag bsgom pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2418:36a-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2418:36a-5: rang lus khong stong bsam byas nas //
T02D2418:36a-6: lte ba'i dkyil du rlung nyid ni //
T02D2418:36a-7: phra la sngo pa yungs kar tshad //
T02D2418:36a-8: rnal 'byor de la sems gtad bya //
T02D2418:36a-9: rnal 'byor ba yi sems nyid skye //
T02D2418:36a-10: de nyid khong stong nam mkha' ru //
T02D2418:36a-11: nam mkha'i sprin ltar thim par bsam //
T02D2418:36a-14: sum mdo rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la //
T02D2418:36a-15: rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po bsam //
T02D2418:36a-16: lte bar me dang snying gar chu //
T02D2418:36a-17: mgrin pa'i sa las rlangs pa thon //
T02D2418:36a-18: gnyis med dd'u t'i me yis khengs //
T02D2418:36a-19: mi mda' chu shing me tog las //
T02D2418:36a-20: rgyas shing sems kyi bung ba ni //
T02D2418:36a-21: ge sar bdud rtsi 'jib par bsam //
T02D2418:36a-22: rlung gis me sbar chu khol bas //
T02D2418:36a-23: drod skyes nam mkha'i bdud rtsi 'bab //
T02D2418:36a-24: khong stong bdud rtsis khengs par bsam //
T02D2418:36a-25: lus la bde ba chen po skye //
T02D2418:36a-26: 'byung ba yas mar rim gyis thim //
T02D2418:36a-27: rlung gi gzhu dang sems kyi mda' //
T02D2418:36a-28: spyi bor bde chen ham las ni //
T02D2418:36a-29: sa nas nam mkha'i dbyings kyi bar //
T02D2418:36a-30: 'ja' tshon mdog ltar sems gtad bya //
T02D2418:36a-31: phyi nang byang chub rang la shar //
T02D2418:36a-32: gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin skye //
T02D2418:36a-33: su ta li bdag bsam mi khyab //
T02D2418:36a-34: gcig la sna tshogs ri bo can //
T02D2418:36a-36: bla ma'i drin gyis grub pa thob //
T02D2418:36a-37: byang chub sems kyi rlung rgyu ba'i man ngag bsgom
